templateName.value: LEAD GSLI Acceptance Letter - Partial Scholarship

html.value:
Hello {{applicantFirstName}} {{applicantLastName}},
 

Congratulations!

On behalf of LEADership Education and Development, we are delighted to offer you admission to the {{programName}}. You were selected based upon your academic performance, essay, recommendations, and extracurricular activities. Your acceptance was also based on our belief that you will offer a unique perspective to your cohort and will add to our talented group of diverse scholars.

Your LEAD GSLI assignment will begin on {{programStartDate}}. Please log back into your application on the portal to complete theLEAD Scholar Acceptance Documents. Please complete the GSLI Acceptance Form by choosing to ACCEPT or DECLINE. If you intend to accept your appointment, you must also complete the Parent/Scholar Consent form, along with upload of your photo and polo size.

We remain excited about the {{programName}} and are truly looking forward to welcoming you into the LEAD community!

Best regards,

LEAD Application Review Team
